case_title: Messrs Rehmani Dawakhana, Main Bazar Gandam Mandi, Kasur vs Commissioner Inland Revenue, RTO, Lahore
appellant: Messrs Rehmani Dawakhana, Main Bazar Gandam Mandi, Kasur

key_issues.legal_defects: Order passed beyond show-cause notice, defective notice invalidating proceedings

summary: The appeal was allowed as the assessment order under section 11(2) of the Sales Tax Act, 1990 was deemed invalid due to a defective show-cause notice. The proceedings and subsequent orders were annulled.
